metadata.title: CVE-2024-35918 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:randomize_kstack: Improve entropy diffusionThe kstack_offset variable was really only ever using the low bits forkernel stack offset entropy. Add a ror32() to increase bit diffusion.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
